title: Aaron Chalmers expecting first baby with Talia Oatway
text:
Aaron has some exciting news (Picture: Getty/Twitter)

Geordie Shore’s Aaron Chalmers has announced he is going to be a dad – just days after splitting from Talia Oatway.

The reality star has confirmed Talia is pregnant with their first child, and he seems absolutely buzzing.

The 32-year-old shared a picture of a baby scan, alongside a baby-grow and a cookie cake both reading ‘Baby Chalmers’.

Aaron wrote: ‘The best surprises are the ones you don’t expect!!!

‘I’m going to be a daddy can’t wait to meet you 💙💕 @taliamiaoatway.’

The best surprises are the ones you don’t expect!!! Im going to be a daddy can’t wait to meet you 💙💕 @taliamiaoatway pic.twitter.com/lPKZHf0GQ4 — Aaron Chalmers (@AaronCGShore) October 22, 2019

Aaron’s Geordie Shore pals filed in with congratulatory messages, with Charlotte Crosby writing: ‘BEST NEWS EVER’ and Gaz Beadle commenting on Instagram: ‘Secrets out congrats again mate welcome to daddy club [sic].’

Talia also confirmed the news with a sweet picture of her, Aaron and her daughter from a previous relationship Siennah, writing: ‘When 3 become 4, my little world is complete.’

The model told her Instagram followers that she had told her daughter the news by writing a message from her baby brother or sister on Siennah’s birthday cake.

While the trio looked like happy families on social media, it was claimed just last week that Aaron and Talia had split after two years together.

Talia is already mum to Siennah from another relationship (Picture: Instagram)

A source told The Sun that the pair had struggled to make things work after a series of rows, and had unfollowed each other on Instagram.

However, they’re back following each other following the baby news.

Back in August, Aaron seemingly predicted he’d be a father very soon, saying: ‘I’ll be joining the dad group soon, I reckon. Since Gaz’s missus has been talking about it she’s become obsessed. I’ve got two dogs and a step-daughter so the next step is my own.’

Aaron, now an MMA fighter, is the latest Geordie Shore alumni to settle down into parenthood after finding fame through partying.

His ex-girlfriend Marnie Simpson is days away from giving birth to her first child with boyfriend Casey Johnson, while Gaz Beadle’s girlfriend Emma McVey is pregnant with their second child, after they welcomed son Chester in January 2018.

Chantelle Connelly also had her first baby, Riccardo, in May.

Metro.co.uk has contacted Aaron’s rep for comment.
